title: Magnificent 7 Earnings: Good or Bad?
text: Of the six members of ‘The Magnificent 7' group that have already reported June-quarter results, the market was disappointed with Tesla TSLA, Alphabet GOOGL, Microsoft MSFT, and Amazon AMZN. Conversely, it was okay with Apple's AAPL quarterly release and loved Meta's META results.

title: Report: Apple Tells WeChat Parent Tencent to Eliminate Payment Loopholes
text: Apple is reportedly pressuring the makers of China's most popular apps — WeChat and Douyin — to stop allowing in-app creators to steer users to payment systems outside the Apple platform.

title: 3 Long-Haul Warren Buffett Stocks That Every Investor Should Consider
text: At age 93, Warren Buffett presides over a vast stock portfolio currently worth nearly $400 billion. From humble beginnings, Buffett has created an equity portfolio that is the envy of the investment world.

title: Berkshire Hathaway Earnings Due. Did Warren Buffett Cut Apple Stock Again?
text: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway will report earnings on Saturday. Here is what to expect.

title: Apple's Multi-Year iPhone Upgrade Cycle and AI Features To Drive Upside, Analysts Say
text: Goldman Sachs analyst Rod Hall maintained Apple Inc AAPL with a Buy and raised the price target from $265 to $275.

title: Apple Earnings Lifted the Stock. Why One Analyst Got More Bearish.
text: Barclays lowered its price target on the iPhone maker's shares.

title: Apple (AAPL) Beats Q3 Earnings Estimates, Revenues Up Y/Y
text: Apple's (AAPL) third-quarter fiscal 2024 results benefit from strong services growth and Mac sales.

title: Apple price target boosted as analysts eye upcoming ‘AI-driven supercycle'
text: Analysts at Wedbush have raised their price target on Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL, ETR:APC) and repeated their ‘Outperform' rating on the stock after the iPhone maker delivered better-than-expected results for the June quarter and a strong outlook. They raised their price target to $285 from $275, implying upside of about 28% from Apple's share price on Friday morning.

title: Apple Beats on Q3 Earnings, Pins Hopes on AI: ETFs to Buy
text: Apple returned to revenue growth in the third-quarter fiscal 2024 and pinned hopes on AI for iPhone upgrades.

title: Apple Stock is Up While the Rest of Wall Street Sells Off
text: Apple stock is higher in Friday's broad-market bashing after the tech giant beat expectations for its fiscal Q3. Here's what you need to know.

title: Apple Stock Rises After Earnings. Why It's the Safe Play in Tech.
text: The shares are ‘a good place to hide,' an analyst wrote after earnings.

title: Amazon sheds $200bn in brutal tech sell off but Apple bucks trend
text: Tech stocks are in for another worrying session on Friday, though Cupertino appears to be bucking the trend. Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL, ETR:APC).

title: Why Apple, Intel, Meta, And Microsoft Stock Moved On AI Strategy
text: It is not enough for business leaders to talk about generative AI — they must harness its power to grow faster.

title: Apple surprises in mixed results for 'magnificent seven' tech giants
text: At the end of a mixed fortnight's worth of trading updates from the US tech giants, it was down to the biggest of them - Apple - to lift investor spirits.

title: Apple To Rally Around 26%? Here Are 10 Top Analyst Forecasts For Friday
text: Top Wall Street analysts changed their outlook on these top names. For a complete view of all analyst rating changes, including upgrades and downgrades, please see our analyst ratings page.

title: These 5 Dividend Stocks Account for 74% of Warren Buffett's $399 Billion Portfolio
text: All of the top five stocks in Berkshire's Hathaway's portfolio pay dividends. Investors can find a good mix of dividends and growth in Berkshire's top holdings.

title: Apple Stock Nearly Holds Up Despite Magnificent 7 Sell-Off In Premarket: What's Going On
text: Shares of Apple, Inc. AAPL fell modestly in premarket trading on Friday, and this assumes importance because all of its Magnificent 7 peers are staring down the barrel.

title: Apple is staring down two different futures for the iPhone
text: Apple is about to find out which future path the iPhone will follow. For a while now, sales of its biggest moneymaker have been declining.

title: Apple Just Sent a Major Warning to Nvidia Investors
text: Apple provided more details about the inner working of its new AI features, Apple Intelligence. An important detail shows a major loss for Nvidia.

title: Did the iPad Save Apple? No.
text: 24/7 Wall St. Insights Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL) posted mediocre results for its latest quarter.

title: Apple breaks out of recent sales slump as it gears up to make its leap into the AI craze
text: Apple snapped out of a prolonged sales slump during its most recent quarter as the trendsetting company prepares to launch into the artificial intelligence craze with an arsenal of new technology that's expected to juice demand for its next iPhone.
